name: Whitehaven Beach All Day
description: Experience the Whitsundays in style aboard Super Flyer, your floating beach club for the day. Cruise through the turquoise waters and feel the salty breeze as you set foot on the pure, white silica sands of Whitehaven Beach. This adventure is perfect for beach lovers and those seeking relaxation, with unlimited transfers between the boat and beach, allowing you to explore at your own pace. Enjoy a guided walk to the breathtaking South Whitehaven Lookout and savor a delicious buffet lunch onboard, making it a memorable day on one of the world's most iconic beaches.
includes:
Unlimited beach-to-boat transfers
Lunch and snacks
Stinger suit
Guided walk to South Whitehaven Lookout
highlights:
Unlimited transfers between the boat and beach
Relax on the white sands of Whitehaven Beach
Guided walk to South Whitehaven Lookout
Onboard buffet lunch
Onboard bar and sun lounges
Large inside area with comfortable seating
Adults only area on top deck
On-demand transfers for maximum flexibility
price_tiers: Adult: FROM A$229 | Child (4+): A$179 | Age 1 to 3: Free
menu:
**Menu:**
- Fresh salads
- Various meats
- Vegetables
- Selection of snacks
ideal_for: Beach lovers, families, and those seeking a relaxing day in the Whitsundays

name: Super Flyer Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel
description: Experience the Whitsundays like never before aboard the Super Flyer, a floating beach club designed for adventure and relaxation. This tour combines the thrill of snorkeling at vibrant coral reefs with the serene beauty of Whitehaven Beach's pure silica sands. Perfect for families, couples, and solo adventurers, this tour offers unlimited transfers between the boat and the beach, allowing you to explore at your own pace. With comfortable seating, an onboard bar, and sun lounges, Super Flyer ensures a memorable day full of sun, sea, and stunning landscapes.
includes:
Snorkeling coral reefs in the Whitsunday Islands
Unlimited transfers between the boat and Whitehaven Beach
Lunch and snacks served onboard
Stinger suit and snorkel equipment
Guided walks and snorkeling adventures
Access to sun lounges on the boat
Onboard bar and coffee machine (pay onboard)
highlights:
Cruise through the turquoise waters of the Whitsundays
Visit the iconic Whitehaven Beach with its pure white silica sands
Snorkeling adventure at a coral reef location known for vibrant marine life
Unlimited on-demand transfers between the boat and the beach
Spacious and comfortable seating areas on the Super Flyer
Adults-only area on the top deck
Dedicated snorkeling boat for easy access to coral reefs
price_tiers: Adult (15+): A$259 | Child (4-14): A$199 | Infant (3 and under): Free
ideal_for: Families, couples, solo adventurers, and anyone looking to explore the Whitsundays in style and comfort.

name: ZigZag Whitsundays Day Tour on Super Flyer
description: Experience the Whitsundays aboard the Super Flyer, a vessel designed for adventure and comfort. This tour is perfect for those seeking a mix of relaxation and exploration, offering a day filled with pristine beaches, guided walks, and snorkeling adventures. With a focus on providing a fun, family-style experience, the tour promises an authentic and memorable journey through the stunning Whitsunday Islands. Guests will enjoy lounging on Whitehaven Beach, discovering the South Whitehaven Lookout, and savoring a fresh buffet lunch prepared onboard. Ideal for families, couples, and solo travelers looking to explore one of Australia's most beautiful natural wonders.
departure_times: Departs from Coral Sea Marina, Airlie Beach. Arrives back at approximately 5:00 PM
includes:
Lunch
Snacks
Stinger Suit
Snorkel Equipment (if applicable)
Guided walk
On-demand water taxi between the boat and Whitehaven Beach
2 outdoor sun lounge areas
Onboard bar (pay onboard)
Coffee machine (pay onboard)
highlights:
4 to 5 hours at Whitehaven Beach
South Whitehaven Lookout
Snorkeling on coral reef
Scenic flight over the Whitsundays (Sea and Sky Combo)
Unlimited guided walks
Fresh buffet lunch prepared onboard
Comfortable seating inside and outside
Adults only area outside on top deck
price_tiers: Adult (Whitehaven Beach All Day): A$229 | Child 4+ (Whitehaven Beach All Day): A$179 | Adult (Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel): A$259 | Child 5+ (Whitehaven Beach Plus Snorkel): A$199 | Adult (Sea and Sky Combo): A$469 | Child (Sea and Sky Combo): A$449
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hill Inlet,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
- Depart from Coral Sea Marina, Airlie Beach.
- Lounge on the pristine sands of Whitehaven Beach.
- Discover the South Whitehaven Lookout.
- Enjoy a guided walk and relax on the beach.
- Snorkel stop to explore the vibrant coral reefs (if applicable).
- Savor a fresh buffet lunch prepared onboard.
- Arrive back at Coral Sea Marina at approximately 5:00 PM.
ideal_for: Families, couples, and solo travelers seeking a mix of relaxation and adventure in the Whitsundays.

name: Super Flyer Snorkelling Tour
description: Experience the Whitsundays aboard Super Flyer, a fast and comfortable boat designed for adventure and relaxation. This tour combines the best of the Whitsundays, offering guests the opportunity to snorkel vibrant coral reefs and explore the stunning Whitehaven Beach. Perfect for families, couples, and solo travelers, this tour provides a unique blend of excitement and tranquility. With a professional and friendly crew, you can enjoy guided snorkelling and a fresh buffet lunch, all while taking in the breathtaking scenery of the Whitsundays.
includes:
Professional snorkel gear (mask, snorkel, fins, wetsuit)
Flotation devices and rescue boards
Buffet lunch and snacks
Fully guided snorkelling experience
Transfers between Super Flyer and snorkel site
Onboard bar and sun lounges for non-snorkellers
highlights:
Daily departures from Coral Sea Marina, Airlie Beach
Snorkelling at a prime Whitsundays reef location
Over 2 hours at Whitehaven Beach including the South Lookout
Air-conditioned indoor seating and sun lounges
Onboard bar for ultimate comfort
Expert local crew with extensive knowledge of the Whitsundays
Active participants in Great Barrier Reef conservation projects
ideal_for: Families, couples, solo travelers, and adventure seekers looking for a mix of snorkelling and beach relaxation.

name: Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise
description: Experience the magic of Airlie Beach at twilight aboard Tallulah, an eco-friendly, whisper-quiet electric boat. This intimate cruise is perfect for small gatherings, offering a unique blend of luxury and environmental responsibility. Enjoy the stunning views as the night lights of Airlie Beach illuminate the bay, with a complimentary glass of bubbles in hand. Ideal for families, friends, or couples seeking a serene and picturesque evening on the water.
includes:
Whisper Quiet Electric Boat
Complimentary glass of bubbles
Nibbles
All-weather protection (wind, rain, and sun)
Up to 8 guests
Private charters welcomed
highlights:
Eco-friendly, electric-powered boat
Intimate cruise for up to 10 people
Luxury lounge-style open plan with pillows and shade
Calm water cruising, perfect for all ages and abilities
Stunning views of Airlie Beach at night
Available drinks packages
ideal_for: Families, friends, couples, and those seeking a serene and eco-friendly sunset experience

name: Super Flyer - Whitehaven Beach All Day
description: Experience the pristine beauty of Whitehaven Beach aboard the Super Flyer, a vessel designed for both adventure and comfort. With its spacious sun lounges, onboard bar, and modern amenities, this tour offers an unforgettable day at one of the world's most stunning beaches. Ideal for families and adventure seekers, you'll enjoy the unique silica sands of Whitehaven and breathtaking views from the South Whitehaven Lookout. Whether you're lounging on the beach or exploring the waters, this tour promises relaxation and excitement in equal measure.
includes:
Lunch
Snacks
Stinger Suit
On-Demand Water Taxi Between Boat And Beach
2 Outdoor Sun Lounge Areas
highlights:
Spend your day lounging on the pristine sands of Whitehaven Beach
Discover the South Whitehaven Lookout
Enjoy the comforts of the Super Flyer with on-demand water taxi
Experience adventure and comfort with sun lounges and onboard bar
Explore guided walks and snorkelling adventures
price_tiers: Adult: FROM A$229 | Child (4+): FROM A$179 | Child (1-3): Free
ideal_for: Families, adventure seekers, and those looking to relax on one of the world's most beautiful beaches
